title: Paatha Edathila Song Lyrics & English Meaning | 808Krshna | Sublahshini

sections.intro: The independent music scene is buzzing with Paatha Edathila, a soul-stirring collaboration between 808Krshna and Sublahshini. This track combines lo-fi aesthetics with poetic Tamil verses, creating a viral sensation that captures the vulnerability of modern love. Dive into the complete lyrics and translation to understand why this song is dominating playlists.
sections.easterEgg:
Hidden Details You Missed! ЁЯХ╡я╕ПтАНтЩВя╕П

  • The song utilizes a signature lo-fi 808 beat pattern (0:45) that defines 808Krshna's unique 'Modern Tamil Indie' production style.
  • The music video features Nivaashiyni, whose presence helped the track gain massive viral traction on Instagram Reels through aesthetic visual storytelling.
  • The lyric 'enna kooti kazhichutta' uses a mathematical metaphor (addition/subtraction) to describe how the protagonist has been emotionally dissected by love.
sections.faq:
Frequently Asked Questions

Who are the singers of Paatha Edathila?

The song is performed by independent artists 808Krshna and Sublahshini.

Is Paatha Edathila a movie song?

No, it is an independent single released under the VYRL South music label.

englishStanzas:
Thadukuren Thayanguren
Thuyaram thoola kedakudhu
Uyaram koodi parakkudhu
Theendum ennam thudikkudhu

[I stumble and I hesitate, my sorrow lies discarded like dust. My spirits fly high and the urge to touch you throbs within me.]

Theeradha dhaagam irukku
oyaadhu indha kirukku

[There is an unquenchable thirst, and this madness of mine will never cease.]

Varaya tharaya medhuva
adi radhe naane thaane
ooradha ennam irukku
orama olinju kedakku
Thuliya alaya muzhiya
mazhayaaga thedi thedi

[Gently reaching the ground, oh Radhe, it is only me. Lingering thoughts hide in the corners; like a drop or a wave, I search for you like the rain.]

Paatha Edathila
Vizhindhiten naa
enna kooti kazhichutta
karayiren naaa

[In the very place I saw you, I have fallen completely. You calculated and divided me, and now I am melting away.]

Vaartha muzhunguren
vazhiyiren naa
Unna paatha vegathula
thozhayiren naa

[I swallow my words and overflow with emotion; in the rush of seeing you, I have lost myself entirely.]

Kaalam poora neram theeka
Kelvi tharava

[To spend all of time and every moment, shall I give you a question?]

Vizhi nee thaaka
Badhil naa keka
Vali nee theerka
ada kan korka

[As your eyes strike me, I seek an answer. As you heal the pain, let our eyes meet and intertwine.]

Padamaley pala kaayam ellam
naan pokka
Thodaamaley un aasa theeka

[Without even a touch, I will heal all these wounds and satisfy your every desire.]

theeradha thee
thoovadha nee
unnal ini
veyilum pani
unnala naal
odadhu da
koodadhu daa

[An unquenchable fire, a you that doesn't shower down. Because of you, even the sun feels like mist; the day won't move forward, and it shouldn't.]

seo.title: Paatha Edathila Song Lyrics & English Meaning | 808Krshna | Sublahshini
seo.description: Full Paatha Edathila songs lyrics, sharable lyrics snippets, Lyrics: Adesh Krishna, Music: 808Krshna, Singer(s): 808Krshna, Sublahshini.
